name: Xiang Meng
story: Chen Lo is the son of a high-ranking Chinese government official. He was enlisted in the military at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks due to his impressive leadership and strategic skills. He has been tasked with leading a squad of elite soldiers on a dangerous mission in enemy territory. Though he is young, he is highly respected by his comrades and feared by his enemies. Despite his success, Chen Lo struggles with the weight of responsibility on his shoulders and often turns to meditation and prayer to find inner peace.
